storyInfo: The Doctor talks one-on-one with the 'Trilby Asher.' Meanwhile, Amiya helps Siege through the bewilderment she's in.

attributes.content: So, your name really is Delphine Windermere.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: How did you know?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I guessed.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Fine. You guessed. Three cheers for you.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: That's a 'Trilby Asher.' You have the Duke of Caster behind you, then.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: No wonder. She's after that Realmblade. Hmph, she's not trying to keep her ambitions up her sleeve anymore.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Looks like you lot are in far more shit situations than I thought.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Is Vina really back in Londinium to take the throne?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You'd have to ask her. I don't really care.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: What do you like to care about, then?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: How not to get my clothes dirty more than anything, if I had to say.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Once I get back, I'll tell my mother she'll want to keep a closer eye on Rhodes Island Pharmaceuticals.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Turns out we were underestimating the 'medical organization.'
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: What, do I not look like a doctor?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I'll try a little harder next time.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Now let's lay our cards on the table, Delphine.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: How many men did the Duke of Windermere deploy on this plate?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I have two bodyguards... but I assume they're both dead.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Just after the Sarkaz put this place under lockdown, they tried to break out with me in tow. They failed.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Two bodyguards. Very down-to-earth for a Duke's Princess.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You have eyes on that sword too?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You can relax. Duke Windermere's not interested in the Sighs of Kings, I can promise you that.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: So why are you here?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Coincidence.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Let me remind you, you owe me one.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: You're capable of leaving right now. I'm guessing Sir 'Trilby Asher' would love to talk with a fellow duke's successor.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: If the Duke of Windermere, fighter of the good fight, knew her own daughter got into an accident on a Sarkaz-surrounded plate, what would she do?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I imagine any duke would love to see her competitor take the first turn in fighting Theresis to the last man.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Of course, I could be too mean theorizing about him. He's still outside. Maybe he'll invite you for afternoon tea?
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I'll be totally frank, Ms. Ines. Your Arts... have saved my life, I can't argue that.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: But me being trapped here really is just a coincidence.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Every duke has their own intelligence network in Londinium, whether it's to monitor Sarkaz movements or peep at what the other dukes are doing.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: If we're being completely honest, the latter's more important than the former.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I simply thought Norport Borough would be a suitable place to hide.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: To go further, an AWOL crown heir once part of the Glasgow Gang would be a very meaningful source of intel for you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Not exactly.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Me and Baird just... liked going to the same video shop.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Hmph—
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: My guess is, the fact Vina can wander around Norport with the Sighs of Kings, and hasn't been shopped off together with the sword to meet the Duke of Caster...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: That's because our 'Trilby Asher' wants to use your group's power to settle some of his own problems.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Right. You're looking for the airship.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It's true, no duke would resist the temptation. Even I want to know how the Sarkaz can construct a flying fortress. It'll upend how future wars are fought.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You people really love these 'wars.'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I'd think a Sarkaz mercenary would be just as passionate.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Okay, fine. I do owe you one. So, what does Rhodes Island, house of darling doctors, plan to use my life for?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Like I just said, I've got no bodyguards or troops I can send out for you here. Be as disappointed as you want, Ms. Ines.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: I can't help you, your friends or that 'Trilby Asher' with any of your issues.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: We can handle our man and the airship ourselves just fine.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Then what do you want? You know full well what I'm worth to Duke Caster, but you still rescued me.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You're not telling me you helped me a bunch just because you're that kind and good of a person?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Sorry, but no.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: *sigh* Worth asking.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: It'd be hard for us to compete with a duke's power, I'll grant that.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: And compared to Rhodes Island, I'm afraid the Duke of Caster has more of her energies focused elsewhere.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I trust you can talk your mother into helping out here.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: That's a very high asking price.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You want the support of my mother stepping up, so you can break free from Duke Caster's control.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You know what a tightrope act that's going to be.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Unfortunately, that's the only choice our house of darling doctors has.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know if their talks with that hotel are going smoothly or not.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Maybe... I should've gone with them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't worry, Amiya. Ms. Ines isn't going to put the Doctor in danger. Besides, we're just borrowing their comms station.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I know. And I know the sick here need me more.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We nailed down a specific evacuation time before they left.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We'll need to withstand the counterattack from the Sarkaz barracks. As long as the dukes and the Sarkaz open fire on each other, the chance is ours to take.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The plan will go smoothly.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes... I'm just somewhat uneasy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's... something here that's stifling me. I don't know what it is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At first, I thought it was just how heavy the atmosphere was in Norport, and after that, I thought... Theresa was wanting to show me something again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it doesn't seem like either of those.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, when I was aboard the landship, I met some who called you 'The King of Sarkaz.' They were Sarkaz themselves.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What does that mean, to you? You clearly aren't a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Do you hope to be a ruler who can lead her subjects? Or a hero who spearheads the charge?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege runs a light hand over the Sighs of Kings at her side. The blade is still ice-cold, as ever.
I don't know, Siege, I have to confess.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There was a future Theresa showed to all of us... I still firmly believe that the future she recounted is worth living for, more than anything else.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But—she gave the crown to me, yet didn't tell me just how I should arrive there. And now, she's... stood opposing us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I can only try to convince myself—that this is her way of testing me.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I haven't actually decided how I'll face her. What will she say to me? How will she look upon what I'm doing?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Will the path I chose by myself... disappoint her?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't know if I'm someone... worth handing the authority of 'The King of Sarkaz.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But still, you chose to undertake that duty.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I worry, myself, that I can't be the person they're all expecting.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The hero who can cleave apart Catastrophe, the monarch who can unite the citizenry...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: How am I meant to do that? How am I meant to... respond to hopes that heavy?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Tear down a wall? Or persuade a few nobles?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Shout to the people? Or use silence to display my majesty?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm not good at any of that, and Gawain never taught me it either.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I spent most of my time in the Glasgow Gang. Beating up rowdy drunkards, running with my friends to help them shake the coppers—that's all I knew.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And I learned a few things at Rhodes Island, but that wasn't going to help me figure out what I should do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I thought... it'd click when I came back.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But once Morgan took the lead on the people here, calling me 'Her Royal Highness'... still, I couldn't find a thing to say.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I don't know what to do. I'm so glad it was just a temporary trick to keep everyone placated.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But then, what if I do genuinely have to take that road?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I just couldn't ignore how these people were suffering, that's all it was. And now it's become this.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Siege... perhaps that much is enough.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresa once told me that 'The King of Sarkaz' wasn't a duty.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I, too... just didn't want to turn away.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor of Rhodes Island, do you like your job?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Well. It seems you believe you're doing something meaningful.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Does the question need such protracted thought to answer?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Hah. So you have grander schemes than your current cause.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Regardless, I can't say I like mine.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Nobody's born in love with all the jockeying and maneuvering. I know I wasn't.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: If it was possible, I'd use my noble name to buy a big plot of land in some far-flung county and while away my afternoons by the fireplace.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: With a small tuskbeast to keep, ideally, and a forest behind the manor, for walks, and pondering questions of literature and poetry and such.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I'm ashamed to say, I'm a lousy poet. Sometimes I get some practice works of mine published in the Londinium Daily's literary supplement.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The man before you fiddles with his hat, almost visibly embarrassed.
The critics take no notice, but it sends me over the moons.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Still, we know that's not an easy life to make real. The ideal never is.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This is the age we've been cast into. All we can do is act in the way it educates us to.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Tell me, who was here just now?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: A Rhodes Island operator.;The owner and doorman of the hotel.

attributes.content: You know who I mean, Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: How about this? We can make a deal on the side.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You bring that operator of yours out of this hotel, and continue on with your mission as previously discussed.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Then once it's done, I'll give you and Her Royal Highness Alexandrina a referral to the Duke.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Not as a pawn or a hostage, but as a guest and a friend.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: We're worth working closer with.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You can be assured, to forever honor her commitments is a tenet of Her Ladyship's.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: You're more interested in a Victorian than a Sarkaz.

attributes.content: Of course. We're in Victoria, after all.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Don't be fooled by her appearances. Do you really think this plate is no more than a lovable little Sarkaz-built prison cell?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: I don't think this place is lovable.

attributes.content: Fine. Miserable, then. Suit yourself.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: While you're occupied with proclaiming yourselves the royal heirs apparent to Victoria and giving the Infected their jabs, I'll be busy, anyhow.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: There are common Londinium folk in torment here, but those aside, there are great numbers of—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: People taking care to cover their tracks. People with ulterior motives.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: The Duke I serve wishes sincerely that Victoria regains its glory after it strides over the coals, but some aren't envisaging the same thing.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I have to root them out. It's another part of my work.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: While saving the citizens here is nothing to do with you?

attributes.content: Let me guess—you're ready to pull from the textbook to criticize me.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: So. No. It is something to do with me. I pray wholeheartedly that every person may live in peace and good health.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But it's not possible, is it?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Some people can cling to the now, tweaking every little thing by themselves, but some have weightier callings to undertake, even if it's not what they wish for.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Such as... seeking a future where a nation can find its footing.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I respect the former type, but all the same, I hope you wouldn't reject the latter.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.options: Every duke could claim the same thing.
They all think they're seeking a future for the nation.
That's the source of the disaster Victoria's in now.

attributes.content: —I won't deny it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Some superficials would say the dukes are merely contesting over authority and advantage. It appears you're not one of them, Doctor of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Authority is only a means, and advantage is only a tool.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: What the dukes are truly vying over are the qualifications to lead this country into the future.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Victoria has been dust-laden for long enough.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: And the Sarkaz will be the sandpaper that wipes Victoria clean. With some polishing, our nation will shine with glory again.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: You really are a lousy poet, Mr. 'Trilby Asher.'
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I see you're finally here, Miss Ines.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I thought I wouldn't catch you in time.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'
